p: The quality of ZRR is affected by different factors such as growing environment and different producing areas. In addition, harvest time, processing methods, and storage conditions affect the quality of ZRR. The medicinal part of ZRR is the rhizoma, and it is often tangled whether to peel it. Due to these factors, the content of active ingredients in ZRR is different, and the quality and clinical efficacy of ZRR cannot be controlled at present.
